title: The default value set in a list box report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: When modifying the default value set in a list box report parameter, the new default value is not retained.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings
2. Set the default value to 'aaa'
3. Save the changes
4. Open the report parameter settings again
5. Modify the default value to 'bbb'

OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The combo box should be displayed instead of the list box.
Expected result: 'aaa' should remain as the default value.
After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
SR: 1. Open the report parameter settings. 2. Set the default value to 'aaa'. 3. Save the changes. 4. Open the report parameter settings again. 5. Modify the default value to 'bbb'. Verify that the default value is successfully retained and displayed as 'aaa'. Verify that after step 5, the OK button is grayed out and cannot be used.
